but file has no extension (missing .mkv). Not an issue for me but others might run into trouble. Just rename the file by adding the .MKV extension yourself and it should work.
Not an .mkv or .avi you assface. Can't change it either cause it doesn't have anything to change at the end. Such a waste of f. time.

Worked fine for me
A10/10

All I did is I renamed the file by adding the .mkv at the end of the file name.

@monkeyslut42

You obviously have no clue. This IS an .mkv file if you look at the description. Try opening your eyes and read what's in front of you. Typing/adding the .mkv on the end is the solution.

If you weren't so busy f***ing monkeys maybe you'd get a REAL education.
peace out......
Not to overstate the obvious, but if U change extension then file will not seed. So either seed first or copy file and change the copy's ext. to watch ASAP. Thanks for seeding!
